alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 1:32AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Lafayette, northwestern Pontotoc, Union, southern Marshall, southern Tippah, southern Benton and west central Prentiss Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 132 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wall Doxey State Park to near Harmontown. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Albany, Wall Doxey State Park, Blue Mountain, Ecru, Cambridge, Harmontown, Keownville, Bethlehem, Laws Hill, Wheeler, Etta, Pinedale, Hickory Flat, Potts Camp, Myrtle, Dumas, Abbeville, Shari, Keel and Graham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Lafayette; Marshall; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tippah; Union
